body.p: The built-in CSS rules are in: [PLUGIN_DIR]/css/print/p-numbering-shallow.css and [PLUGIN_DIR]/css/print/p-numbering-deep.css . The first CSS contains the rules that add a "Chapter NN" before the first level topics from the publication, the later contains rules that add a deep structure of counters on all topics referred from the map, at any level.
